channel.title: Need help with NPC's and items and my server
channel.description:
hi, can some one help me? i have started to make my server... i used cheezcape source now i need to know how to spawn money in it, and how to make other chars... and if other people can make em. and i cant get other people to play because it dosnt work for some reason. also i need to know how to make NPC's and how to spawn items.thanx
how do other ppl make accounts? thanx

item.description:
@rugby wrote:

It dosnt matter if use a router and below my rep there should be a button called REP++
